wikipedia_page.main: John Vincent Pritchard (born 29 September 1995) is an English professional footballer who plays as a  defender or midfielder for Ashton United.

response: *John Pritchard (Canadian politician) (1861–1941), Progressive party member of the Canadian House of Commons
*John Pritchard (rower) (born 1957), British rower who competed in the 1980 and 1984 Summer Olympics
*John Pritchard (MP) (1797–1891), British Member of Parliament for Bridgnorth
